RTMP_DEST_KEY.description: RTMP url to publish to destination

MEDIA_SRC_DEST.description: Media source of video content, you can seperate multiple sources with comma (,)

TYPE_RESOLUTION_STREAM.description: Type Screen resolution size of video stream (available: FIXED_RESOLUTION, CUSTOM_RESOLUTION)

RESOLUTION_STREAM.description: Screen resolution size of video stream (e.g. 1280x720) Default is 1920x1080

ENCODER_STREAM.description: encoder of video stream (e.g. libx264, h264_nvenc, h264_qsv, h264_amf, h264_vaapi) Default: libx264

INFINITY_LOOP.description: This option will loop the video infinitely. Default: false

SHOW_VERBOSE.description: This option will show verbose log. Default: false
